commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Now let's keep things going! What's coming up next?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It's the Best of the Bunch School Idol Contest.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The Best of the Bunch School Idol Contest?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes. A contest to decide the best school idol in various areas by battling it out.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ooh, that sounds pretty interesting. I feel like this will make for some unforgettable battles with our prides on the line.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes, indeed it will.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: So what kind of battles will we be seeing?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: The first contest will be a dance battle!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: A dance battle, huh? The perfect contest for school idols. But how are we gonna decide who wins?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: The audience will be our judge! Clap as loudly as you can for the person you think performed better!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: So the audience will decide, huh? The person who receives the most applause will be crowned the winner, then. That's motivation enough to win! So who are our contestants?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Eli Ayase from μ's and Karin Asaka from the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You won't want to miss a moment of this dance battle between these two remarkable dancers!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Would our two contestants please step forward?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I never thought I'd be competing against you in another dance battle, Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: And I couldn't have asked for a better opportunity. I've really stepped up my practice ever since I lost to you, Eli.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: In saying that, I mean I improved on my steps starting from the basics, and now I can truly express myself.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* So you're saying you've changed since our last battle. Looks like I'm in for a treat.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: But just so you know, I've also changed since then. I'm sorry to say this, but I'll come out on top once again this time.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Don't lead yourself to think that everything will fall into place as easily as you make it sound.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Looks like our two contestants are already butting heads from the get-go!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Then let us begin the dance battle!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: This dance battle has pushed the envelope even further than I expected. Either one of them could win this thing!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed, this is a battle for the ages.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Karin really has changed since our last battle. I can tell just by watching her that she is thinking about how to make it fun for others.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: She was more self-concerned back then, more focused on the quality of her performance.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's like she's been completely reborn in this short span of time. Her performance captivated me.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff* I was only able to grow and improve thanks to you, Eli. I'm glad I got to show off the results of my hard work today.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: But you never cease to amaze me. You're not even out of breath after all of that dancing.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Both of our contestants put on a great show! It'll be hard to pick the winner! But a battle's a battle, so we need to decide who takes home the crown.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Please give a round of applause if you think Eli was the better dancer.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Mmhmm, right. Got it. And those who preferred Karin?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Hmm. Perhaps Karin has garnered a slightly louder round of applause?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The winner of the dance battle is Karin!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Phew... Guess I managed to exact my revenge for last time.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I lost today. It was clear how much time and effort you put into your dancing practice. You won fair and square.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's one loss and one win each. We're still tied, so I won't lose next time, either!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Bring it on. I'll make sure to polish up my dance skills in preparation for our next bout.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We were treated to a legendary battle that had us on the edge of our seats from the very first round.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It took every last bit of strength I had to control my urge to dance along!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: While we are still reeling from the heat of the first battle, I would like to continue along to the second contest.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: And what is the second contest?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: A contest to decide who can remain calm under all circumstances! A battle of nerves!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Oh, because being brave is important for a school idol, right? So we'll be seeing how calm and collected our contestants stay no matter what's thrown at them, eh?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed. The contestants in this round were informed prior to their battle, so it will also be interesting to see what strategies they use to faze their opponent.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: So who will be battling it out this time around?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: We have Nozomi Tojo from μ's up against Kanata Konoe from the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I lost in the last test of nerves, but I might just go ahead and win this one.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Chuckle* I won't be fazed this time, either.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Kanata seems calm and collected.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Let the second match begin!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Sorry, Kana, but I'm totally gonna defeat you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Nothing you do will affect me.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Are you still gonna be able to say that when you listen to this?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: A smartphone? What are you gonna make me listen to?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Heh heh heh. I'll play it for you now.

commands.speaker: Haruka
commands.line: I hate you, Sis!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: H-Haruka?! What? Uhh... Huhhh?! You hate me? Aww, but why? Did I do something wrong? What was it? What did I do?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Oh-ho! A textbook example of dismay, I must say!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Haruka hates me! What do I do?! Aww, I don't know what I should do!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: There's more to this. Just watch.

commands.speaker: Haruka
commands.line: Just kidding! Gotcha, didn't I? Thanks for always making me your number one priority. I loooooove you!

commands.speaker: Haruka
commands.line: I'm looking forward to seeing you out and on stage at the School Idol Festival today!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: A-Aww! Haruka! I love you too! I'm gonna do my very best!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Her mood's done a complete 180 after the truth was revealed. The sheer speed of her recovery reminds me of Chika.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Now it is time for Kanata to try her hand. You will find yourself in the losing circle if you cannot manage to faze Nozomi.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Haruka...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm mean, I'm listening!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh no, oh no... I gotta stay calm. Caaalm... Um, this is what I brought today. Here. Give it a read.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: A letter? I wonder who it's from?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Wait, it's from all of μ's?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: They don't get the opportunity to thank you every day, so I got everyone to write about how grateful they are to you.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Th-This is totally breaking the rules.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The more she reads, the redder her face becomes. She's clearly getting flustered.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I hereby declare this match a draw.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I didn't come away with the win, but I'm not mad about it since I'm so full of happiness right now.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Same here.
